27.eng-name: Pilgrims Prevented from Completing the Pilgrimage

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "Whoever performs Hajj to this Ka`ba and does not approach his wife for sexual relations nor commit sins (while performing Hajj), he will come out as sinless as a newborn child, (just delivered by his mother)

chapter.ara-name: بَابُ قَوْلِ اللَّهِ عَزَّ وَجَلَّ: {وَلاَ فُسُوقَ وَلاَ جِدَالَ فِي الْحَجِّ}
chapter.eng-name: "... Nor commit sin nor dispute unjustly during Hajj ..."
